mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TESTLIB.BOOKMST A ORDER BY RENTCHK
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TESTLIB.BOOKMST (title, book_cd,b_group, c_group, publish,author,rentchk,imageurl, rcv_date, isbn, price, summary, rcmdchk) VALUES (#{title},#{book_cd},#{b_group}, #{c_group}, #{publish},#{author},'0', #{imageurl}, #{rcv_date}, #{isbn}, #{price}, #{summary}, '')
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TESTLIB.BOOKMST WHERE book_cd=#{book_cd} FETCH first 1 rows only

SELECT A.title, A.author, A.publish, A.b_group, A.rentchk, A.rcmdChk, A.imageurl, A.reservechk, A.book_cd, B.returndate FROM TESTLIB.BOOKMST A LEFT OUTER JOIN testlib.bookrent B ON A.book_cd = B.book_cd AND A.rentchk = B.rentchk WHERE LCASE(A.TITLE) like #{keyword} ORDER BY A.RENTCHK DESC, A.RCV_DATE DESC FETCH first 200 rows only

SELECT A.title, A.author, A.publish, A.b_group, A.rentchk, A.rcmdChk, A.imageurl, A.reservechk, A.book_cd, B.returndate FROM TESTLIB.BOOKMST A LEFT OUTER JOIN testlib.bookrent B ON A.book_cd = B.book_cd AND A.rentchk = B.rentchk WHERE LCASE(A.AUTHOR) like #{keyword} ORDER BY A.RENTCHK DESC, A.RCV_DATE DESC FETCH first 200 rows only

SELECT A.title, A.author, A.publish, A.b_group, A.rentchk, A.rcmdChk, A.imageurl, A.reservechk, A.book_cd, B.returndate FROM TESTLIB.BOOKMST A LEFT OUTER JOIN testlib.bookrent B ON A.book_cd = B.book_cd AND A.rentchk = B.rentchk WHERE LCASE(A.PUBLISH) like #{keyword} ORDER BY A.RENTCHK DESC, A.RCV_DATE DESC FETCH first 200 rows only

SELECT A.title, A.author, A.publish, A.b_group, A.rentchk, A.rcmdChk, A.imageurl, A.reservechk, A.book_cd, B.returndate FROM TESTLIB.BOOKMST A LEFT OUTER JOIN testlib.bookrent B ON A.book_cd = B.book_cd AND A.rentchk = B.rentchk ORDER BY rcv_date DESC FETCH first 200 rows only

SELECT A.title, A.author, A.publish, A.b_group, A.rentchk, A.imageurl, A.reservechk, A.book_cd, b.returndate FROM TESTLIB.BOOKMST A inner join tESTLIB.BOOKrent B on a.book_cd = b.book_cd and a.rentchk = b.rentchk where rcv_date between #{date1} and #{date2} and left(b_group,1) = 'B' ORDER BY rcv_date DESC

SELECT title, author, b_group, a.publish, b.book_cd, a.rentchk, a.reservechk, A.rcmdChk, A.imageurl, case when b.returndate <> '' then b.returndate end as returnDate FROM testlib.bookmst A inner join tESTLIB.BOOKrent B on a.book_cd = b.book_cd and a.rentchk = b.rentchk where left(B.rentdate,6) = #{month} group by title, author, b_group, a.publish, b.book_cd, a.rentchk, a.reservechk, A.rcmdChk, b.returndate, A.imageurl ORDER BY count(b.book_cd) DESC FETCH first 10 rows only

SELECT A.title, A.author, A.publish, A.b_group, A.rentchk, A.rcmdChk, A.imageurl, A.reservechk, A.book_cd, B.returndate FROM TESTLIB.BOOKMST A inner join tESTLIB.BOOKrent B on a.book_cd = b.book_cd and a.rentchk = b.rentchk where A.rcmdchk = '1'
mapper.update: UPDATE TESTLIB.BOOKMST SET TITLE=#{title} , publish=#{publish}, author=#{author}, imageurl=#{imageurl} WHERE BOOK_CD=#{book_cd}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TESTLIB.BOOKMST WHERE rcv_date is not null and imageurl != '' ORDER BY rcv_date DESC FETCH first 5 rows only
